txt.en:
[placeholder],

Please make your way to me in all haste. There is a matter that I believe is of great importance to you. Find me, as always, within our training hall at the Mud-gate in Bree.

Albra

'It seems that you have reached another important milestone in your journey as a [placeholder], [placeholder].\n\n'You may have noticed that I have in my possession a number of books that may help you to become a better [placeholder]. Now that you are ready to read them, you should buy these books and learn what they have to teach you.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to her. Apparently, there is something that she wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Albra Lowbanks in Bree
Albra Lowbanks sent you a letter requesting that you visit her in the training hall in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Albra. She can be found in the training hall for burglars beneath the Mud-gate.
